code: import axios from"axios";import{useState,useEffect}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Attendance(){const[username,setUsername]=useState("");const[date,setDate]=useState("");const[records,setRecords]=useState([]);const markAttendance=async()=>{await axios.post("http://127.0.0.1:8000/attendance",{username,date});alert("Attendance marked");};useEffect(()=>{axios.get("http://127.0.0.1:8000/attendance").then(res=>setRecords(res.data));},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Attendance"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{placeholder:"Username",onChange:e=>setUsername(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"date",onChange:e=>setDate(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:markAttendance,children:"Mark Attendance"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:records.map(r=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[r.username," - ",r.date]},r.id))})]});}export default Attendance;
